def_cn: （为了成功或存活的）依靠，依赖
def_en: Your dependence on something or someone is your need for them in order to succeed or be able to survive.

def_cn: (对毒品或酒精的)依赖，瘾，癖
def_en: If you talk about drug dependence or alcohol dependence, you are referring to a situation where someone is addicted to drugs or is an alcoholic.

def_cn: （受其影响或决定的）依赖（关系）
def_en: You talk about the dependence of one thing on another when the first thing will be affected or determined by the second.
